content: असूयति <ab>Den.</ab> <ab>P.</ab> (<ls>P. III. 1. 27</ls>) {@--1@} To envy, to be jealous of; कथं चित्रगतो भर्ता मयाऽसूयितः <ls>M. 4.</ls> {@--2@} To detract from; murmur, grumble at, be displeased with, scorn, be discontented with or angry with (with <ab>dat.</ab> of person or thing); असूयंति सचिवोपदेशाय <ls>K. 108</ls>; असूयंति मह्यं प्रकृतयः <ls>V. 4</ls>; न्यसनाय ससौरभस्य कस्तरुसूनस्य शिरस्यसूयति <ls>Śi. 16. 20</ls>; <ls>Bg. 3. 31</ls>; sometimes with <ab>acc.</ab>; असूयंति हि राजानो जनाननृतवादिनः <ls>Mb.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To cause to murmur at.
